    iOS 7 – Orientation

    I rarely feel lost because I have a fairly good sense of direction. I’m one of those people who likes to know which direction is North. Once I know, I don’t forget. This said, Compass of iOS 7 is one of the most visually interesting orientation tools I’ve ever used. The buttonless UI feels like a liquid pool inside my black iPhone 4s. A nice addition to the new Compass is a level. I highly enjoyed using the level on our shop tables at Woo To See You. I’ve caught myself levelling things around me just to see if what looks straight is actually straight. Surprisingly, most surfaces are out by 1 degree. If you put your iPhone on its side, the app is great for levelling pictures. Getting the green light is satisfying.
